Title: CSE 431 Bboard/Mail Log
Body: Let L be the language in P and we want to show that L^* is in P. For an input w=a_1 a_2 ... a_n, suppose we define a directed graph G on {1,2,...,n+1} as follows: there is an edge from i to j iff a_i ... a_{j-1} is in L. Then, w is in L^* iff there is a path from 1 to n+1 in G.
